analysis.description:
PoCGame.payout (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#191-201) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#200)

PoCGame.loseWager (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#215-232) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#222-227)

PoCGame.play (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#147-179) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#202-213):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#208-210)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#212)

Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#215-232):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#222-227)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#227)

Detected issues with version pragma in /data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x07f7ecb66d788ab01dc93b9b71a88401de7d0f2e.sol#7-9): it allows old versions
